Name: team_must_be_cross_functional
Description: The team must have a minimum number of distinct skills

Name: worker_availability_threshold
Description: An individual worker's availability must be above a minimum threshold

Name: feature_priority_must_match
Description: Features with 'Critical' priority must be developed first

Name: blocker_severity_tolerance
Description: No blocker with 'Critical' severity is allowed to remain unresolved for more than X days

Name: sprint_goal_must_be_defined
Description: Every sprint must have a defined goal

Name: task_effort_estimation_required
Description: Every task must have an effort estimation greater than zero

Name: stakeholder_influence_recognition
Description: Key stakeholders (high influence) must be identified and managed

Name: project_budget_hard_limit
Description: The total project cost must not exceed the allocated budget

Name: velocity_consistency
Description: Team velocity should not drop below a certain stability threshold

Name: sprint_duration_fixed
Description: Sprint duration must be fixed and cannot be changed
